File libsrc/libmath/tred2.c

Public Functions

tred2 
 void tred2(int n,
            double *a,
            double *d,
            double *e,
            double *z)
Reduce a real symmetric matix to a tridiagonal matrix.

Copied from Lecture Notes in Computer Science Matrix Eigensystem Routines - EISPACK Guide, B. T. Smith et. al (Springer-Verlag 1974)

Parameters:
n - dimension of matrix
a - n by n real symmetric matrix a[i+j*n]
d - n diagonal elememts of the output tridiagonal
e - e[0]=0., e[1] to e[n-1] are subdiagonal elements
z - n by n orthogonal transformation matrix
